resources.string: Hentoid is a Hentai Manga\n reader & archiving app
Starting with Android 6.0,\n we need to ask you for permission to device storage
Hentoid supports:\n nhentai, hitomi, tsumino & archived downloads from FAKKU and Pururin
Hentoid requires a dedicated folder for storing your media
If you have prior downloads,\n make sure to set that as your storage folder
With that out of the way,\n enjoy the app!
